duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative customer service support, addressing billing questions, policy changes, and rate changes.
Obtain the Personal Lines Property & Casualty (P&C) License as part of training and communicate underwriting guidelines and policies to service customer accounts.
Upsell, cross-sell, and retain customers by identifying gaps in their coverage and providing additional support beyond regular business hours.
Proactively share knowledge to provide a positive customer experience and adapt to each customer's needs in a consultative, non-scripted approach.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account related questions from internal and external customers.
Use technology and learning resources to deliver efficient problem resolution and stay current with relevant products and industry developments.
Meet or exceed performance measurement goals, while identifying innovative process changes to support business practices.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred.
